DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : The group cervicogenic headache patient receive upper cervical upper thoracic thrust manipulation demonstrate significant clinically important change outcome compare mobilization exercise group .
DOC.brief_title: Manual Therapy Exercise Patients With Cervicogenic Headache
DOC.detailed_description: Patients cervicogenic headache randomize receive 6-8 session 2-4 week either : ( 1 ) upper cervical upper thoracic thrust manipulation , ( 2 ) upper cervical upper thoracic non-thrust mobilization range motion , strength postural exercise .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis cervicogenic headache define Cervicogenic Headache International Study Group criteria Headache frequency least one per week minimum 3 month Minimum pain score ( NPRS ) 2/10 minimum disability score ( NDI ) 10/50 Bilateral headache Presence follow atherosclerotic risk factor : hypertension , diabetes , heart disease , stroke , transient ischemic attack , peripheral vascular disease , smoking , hypercholesterolemia hyperlipidemia Red flag note patient 's Neck Medical Screening Questionnaire ( i.e . tumor , fracture , metabolic disease , RA , osteoporosis , prolonged history steroid use , etc . ) History whiplash injury within last 6 week Diagnosis cervical spinal stenosis Bilateral upper extremity symptom Evidence central nervous system involvement , include hyperreflexia , sensory disturbance hand , intrinsic muscle waste hand , unsteadiness walking , nystagmus , loss visual acuity , impaired sensation face , alter taste , presence pathological reflex ( i.e . positive Hoffman 's and/or Babinski reflex ) Two positive neurologic sign consistent nerve root compression , include two following : Muscle weakness involve major muscle group upper extremity . Diminished upper extremity deep tendon reflex biceps , brachioradialis , triceps superficial flexor Diminished absent sensation pinprick upper extremity dermatome Prior surgery neck thoracic spine . Involvement litigation worker 's compensation regard neck pain and/or headache . Physical therapy chiropractic treatment neck pain headache 3 month baseline examination . Any condition might contraindicate spinal manipulative therapy
